Reviews.Title: “Nice staff, perfect position.”

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel valle 6 night xmas holidays time rome hotel staff helpfull clean enought perfect position steps value money budget hotel city center

Reviews.Title: “Solid value hotel. Great location, everything you need, but no frills.”
Reviews.Author: JohnWayne12
Reviews.Content: stay exactly expected describe valle hotel adequate hotel location clean carpet comforter giving somewhat shabby feel breakfast spectacular plenty decent hard boiled eggs slices processed cheeses processed meat maybe bologna rolls cereal yogurt coffee bed plenty comfortable quiet air conditioner staff helpful nice dont book greenline tours tours priced mediocre compared ones available clean comfortable cheap walking distance lot sites option

Reviews.Title: “Great location but thin walls! Overall had a good stay”
Reviews.Author: Mimiwu
Reviews.Content: valle hotel excellent location minutes temini station handy flying ciampino airport private bus airport termini €4 10 mins walk colosseum floor lifts hotel walls super thin hear people waiting lifts coughing standard bed comfortable nice touch mini bar store drinks air condition controlled half night isnt 30 degrees night issue key overall recommend valle 3 wouldnt recommend travelling rome july unless stand walking blazing heat

Reviews.Title: “All you need from a hotel in rome”

Reviews.Content: hotel excellent location minuites walk termini station colloseum didnt expect central main attraction sights hotel basics clean excellent bathroom decor refresh bed slept didnt view looked onto contributed quiet undisturbed nights facing onto street service suggest base visit rome
